name: Data Quality
description: Measures ensuring data meets quality standards

name: Completeness
description: Measure of whether all required data is present

name: Accuracy
description: Correctness and precision of data values

name: Consistency
description: Data uniformity across systems and time

name: Timeliness
description: Whether data is available when needed

name: Validity
description: Data conformance to defined formats and rules

name: Customer Metrics
description: Key performance indicators related to customers

name: Customer Lifetime Value
description: Total revenue expected from a customer over their lifetime

name: Churn Rate
description: Percentage of customers who cancel or don't renew

name: Customer Acquisition Cost
description: Average cost to acquire a new customer
